monogr.title: Syriac Polemics: Studies in Honour of Gerrit Jan Reinink

body.bibl: Ginkel, Jan J. van. “The End Is Near! Some Remarks on the Relationship between Historiography, Eschatology, and Apocalyptic Literature in the West-Syrian Tradition.” In Syriac Polemics: Studies in Honour of Gerrit Jan Reinink, edited by Wout Jac van Bekkum, Jan Willem Drijvers, and Alex C. Klugkist, 205–17. Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta 170. Leuven: Peeters, 2007.
